question: Which hook is useful for optimizing slow input updates (React 18)?
Which hook marks updates as low priority (React 18)?
Which property sets the size of a background image?
Which value scales background image to cover container (may crop)?
explanation: cover fills container and may crop.

question: Which value scales background image to fit inside container (no crop)?
explanation: contain fits entire image without cropping.

question: Which property changes the opacity of only the background (not children) using RGBA?
explanation: Use rgba() in background-color to affect only background.

question: Which attribute is used on <script> to load a JS file?
Which script attribute loads the script after HTML is parsed?
explanation: defer executes after parsing, in order.

question: Which script attribute loads and executes as soon as its ready (may be out of order)?
Which statement is used to create a promise that resolves immediately?
Which statement is used to create a promise that rejects immediately?
Which method runs multiple promises in parallel and resolves when all succeed?
explanation: Promise.all resolves when all promises resolve.

question: Which Promise method resolves when any one promise resolves (or rejects if all reject)?
explanation: Promise.any resolves with the first fulfilled promise.

question: Which Promise method resolves/rejects as soon as the first promise settles?
explanation: Promise.race settles with the first settled promise.

question: Which file is commonly the entry point where React app mounts (Vite default)?
explanation: Vite commonly uses main.jsx as entry.

question: Which prop is used to set an image source in JSX?
Which attribute is used to add accessibility text to an image?
Which prop is used to dangerously set raw HTML in React?
Why is it called dangerouslySetInnerHTML?
options: It can cause XSS if used with untrusted content
explanation: Untrusted HTML can lead to XSS vulnerabilities.

question: Which unit is relative to the element's font size?
explanation: em is relative to the element's font size.

question: Which unit is relative to the root (html) font size?
explanation: rem is relative to the root font size.

question: Which unit is relative to the viewport height?
Which unit is relative to the viewport width?
Which attribute defines an elements tooltip text?
explanation: title shows tooltip in many browsers.

question: Which DOM property sets or gets HTML content inside an element?
Which DOM property sets or gets only text content (no HTML)?
Which method adds a class to an element in DOM?
Which method removes a class from an element in DOM?
Which method toggles a class on an element in DOM?
What is the correct way to update state based on previous state?
explanation: Functional update uses the previous value safely.

question: Which technique helps split large React code into smaller chunks?
explanation: Code splitting loads code on demand.

question: Which pattern is used to render different UI for different routes?
explanation: Routing renders UI based on URL.

question: Which property sets the minimum width of an element?
Which property sets the maximum width of an element?
Which property makes an element transparent but still clickable (keeps layout)?
explanation: opacity: 0 hides visually but keeps layout and events.

question: Which method converts a value to a boolean?
Which operator converts a value to boolean quickly?
Which function delays execution by placing callback in the task queue?
Which API is used to run a callback before the next repaint?
Which hook is typically used for performing DOM measurements?
explanation: useLayoutEffect runs before paint, good for measurements.

question: Which function is used to create a ref in class components?
explanation: React.createRef() is used in class components.

question: Which method is used to forward refs to child components?
Which media feature is used to target screen width in media queries?
explanation: min-width/max-width are used in media queries.

question: Which rule defines styles only when the screen is below 600px (example)?
